haxe.io.Input

type
class
subclasses
haxe.io.BytesInput, neko.io.FileInput, neko.net.SocketInput, php.io.FileInput
available in
neko, flash9, php, flash8, flash7, flash6
An Input is an abstract reader. See other classes in the haxe.io package for several possible implementations.
